snippet: Deborah Hersman, the chairwoman of the National Transportation Safety Board, is leaving to become president and chief executive of the National Safety Council.
abstract: Deborah Hersman, chairwoman of National Transportation Safety Board, is leaving to become president and chief executive of National Safety Council.
lead_paragraph: Deborah Hersman, the chairwoman of the National Transportation Safety Board, is leaving to become president and chief executive of the National Safety Council.

headline.main: New Job for Government Safety Board Chairwoman
